smartchrome_task.context: Our custom renderer A11y walker crashed because Blink's AXObjectCache is constantly dirty. We will pivot to using Chromium's stable, native RequestAXTreeSnapshot API in the Browser process. The Renderer will now act only as a layout trigger ping. The Browser process will natively request the AXTree update, parse it to JSON, capture the screenshot, and dispatch the HTTP POST.
